query:
ALTER TABLE candidateNotificationPreferences 
ADD COLUMN quietHoursEnabled TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN quietHoursStart VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
ADD COLUMN quietHoursEnd VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '08:00',
ADD COLUMN timezone VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Asia/Riyadh';
